com.github.jnstockley.addressbook

Class BackendHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.jnstockley.addressbook.BackendHelper

  • public class BackendHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple helper class that helps with checking if data exists on the database and what the newest address, person or occupation is on the database.
    Version:
    3.0.1
    Author:
    jnstockley

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BackendHelper()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean exisits(java.sql.Connection conn, Address address)
      Returns a boolean determining if an address exists on the database
      boolean exisits(java.sql.Connection conn, Occupation occupation)
      Returns a boolean determining if an occupation exists on the database
      boolean exisits(java.sql.Connection conn, Person person)
      Returns a boolean determining if a person exists on the database
      int mostRecentAddress(java.sql.Connection conn)
      Returns the id of the most recent address on the database based on highest id
      int mostRecentOccupation(java.sql.Connection conn)
      Returns the id of the most recent occupation on the database based on highest id
      int mostRecentPerson(java.sql.Connection conn)
      Returns the id of the most recent person on the database based on highest id
      boolean upToDate()
      Checks a file stored on the github repository and gets the current version number and checks if the current version is less then the latest version

      • upToDate

        public boolean upToDate()
        Checks a file stored on the github repository and gets the current version number and checks if the current version is less then the latest version
        Returns:
        Either true if the program is up to date or false if its not

      • exisits

        public boolean exisits(java.sql.Connection conn,
                       Address address)
        Returns a boolean determining if an address exists on the database
        Parameters:
        conn - The MySQL connection
        address - The address that is being checked if it exits on the database
        Returns:
        True if address is on the database false otherwise

      • exisits

        public boolean exisits(java.sql.Connection conn,
                       Occupation occupation)
        Returns a boolean determining if an occupation exists on the database
        Parameters:
        conn - The MySQL connection
        occupation - The occupation that is being checked if it exists on the database
        Returns:
        True if occupation is on the database false otherwise

      • exisits

        public boolean exisits(java.sql.Connection conn,
                       Person person)
        Returns a boolean determining if a person exists on the database
        Parameters:
        conn - The MySQL connection
        person - The person that is being check if it exists on the database
        Returns:
        True if person is on the database false otherwise

      • mostRecentAddress

        public int mostRecentAddress(java.sql.Connection conn)
        Returns the id of the most recent address on the database based on highest id
        Parameters:
        conn - The MySQL connection
        Returns:
        The id of the newest address or -1 if no addresses

      • mostRecentOccupation

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The id of the newest occupation or -1 if no occupations

        Returns:
